description: This file configures a development server with middleware for visual editing of React components and source files, including AST-based modifications, CORS handling, and Git integration.

methods.name: resolveSourceFile
methods.description: Resolves an import source path to an absolute file path based on project structure and extensions.

methods.name: validateVariableEdit
methods.description: Validates a variable edit request for safety and correctness.

methods.name: processVariableEdit
methods.description: Processes a variable edit by parsing, modifying AST, and writing back to source file.

methods.name: modifyObjectProperty
methods.description: Modifies a nested property within an object AST node.

methods.name: findProperty
methods.description: Finds a property in an object expression by name.

methods.name: jsonToAst
methods.description: Converts a JSON value to a Babel AST node.
